mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (bkid, name, atid, price, state, introduce, remark, publisher, storedate, isbn, isbn10, imgs, publishadd, publishdate, page, category, language, chinaclass, binding) VALUES (#{bkid}, #{name}, #{atid}, #{price}, #{state}, #{introduce}, #{remark}, #{publisher}, #{storedate}, #{isbn}, #{isbn10}, #{imgs}, #{publishadd}, #{publishdate}, #{page}, #{category}, #{language}, #{chinaclass}, #{binding})
mapper.select: SELECT book.*, author.name AS author FROM book, author WHERE bkid = #{bkid} AND book.atid = author.atid
